DOC.brief_summary: Standard Quit Win contest , smoker typically quit one month return opportunity win prize , simple easy implement may cost-effective encourage smoker quit . By extend contest length enhance counsel content , Quit Win contest may effective encourage smoke abstinence . This study aim evaluate efficacy extend content-enhanced Quit Win contest enhance smoking abstinence college campus .
DOC.brief_title: Quit Win Contests Improve Smoking Cessation Among College Students
DOC.detailed_description: Participants randomize 1 4 treatment group vary counsel treatment contest length . All participant receive 2 week supply nicotine replacement therapy ( NRT ) weekly support email . Follow-up assessment survey occur 1 , 3 , 4 6 month post enrollment . Participants complete follow-up assessment survey self-reported tobacco-free ask provide urine sample order verify abstinence .
DOC.criteria: Enrolled full parttime one participating campuses Smoke least 10 day per month Intending school entire academic year ( i.e. , next 2 semester ) Willing provide baseline urine sample verify smoke status Able read English Access work telephone phonebased counsel survey Access computer internet access Provide write informed consent Prior concurrent enrollment study different college campus different academic year use cessation aid within last 7 day pregnant plan become pregnant next 3 month
